page.title: 19Tenbury Church 2
page.content: The vicars name is Mr Garnett who is very nice to talk to and he will explain anything you want to know about the church.The old organist was called Thomas Henry Newall who died last year and he had been organist since 1944-1984.The new organist is 14 year old John Harris who is a very talented boy.Service times:Holy Communion,10am,Evening Prayer 6.30pm. The Catholic Church once held services (1936) in the Pump Rooms, then (1939_1974)a converted stable at Maryvale. A new church was built and opened by Bishop of Birmingham 11 July 1974. The present priest lives Stourport. Mass is held 11am each Sunday,Benediction once a month.
